title: Olivia Palermo catches the eye in a plunging lace and leather gown at charity gala in London
text:
She is a fashion maven who has carved out a reputation for her stunning red carpet looks.

And Olivia Palermo commanded attention as she joined her handsome husband Johannes Huebl at the Fabulous Fund Fair in aid of the Naked Heart Foundation in London on Thursday.

The former reality star, 33, and her model love, 41, looked smitten as they posed up a storm on the red carpet.

Chic: Olivia Palermo commanded attention as she joined her handsome husband Johannes Huebl at the Fabulous Fund Fair in aid of the Naked Heart Foundation in London on Thursday

The beauty teased a glimpse of her cleavage in a racy semi-sheer bralet paired with a plunging leather gown.

The gorgeous gown cinched in at her slender waist and flared into a three-quarter-length skirt.

She boosted her petite frame with silver stiletto sandals and accessorised with a mirrored clutch bag.

Her brunette tresses were styled in a sleek half updo while her gorgeous features were enhanced with metallic shadow, fluttery lashes and rose gloss.

Work it: The beauty, 33, teased a glimpse of her cleavage in a racy semi-sheer bralet paired with a plunging leather gown

Hot couple: The gorgeous gown cinched in at her slender waist and flared into a three-quarter-length skirt

Johannes looked dapper in a powder blue shirt and plum tie, teamed with a navy suit and shades as he embraced his wife.

Olivia shot to fame when she appeared in MTV's The Hills spin-off, The City, which documented Whitney Port's move to New York to work for Diane von Furstenberg in 2008.

The socialite appeared in both seasons of the reality show, as Whitney's workplace friend and later rival.

Smitten: Johannes looked dapper in a powder blue shirt and plum tie, teamed with a navy suit and shades as he embraced his wife

Since featuring on the series, Olivia has become one of the most established front-row regulars on the fashion circuit, attending the world's most prestigious events.

Olivia and Johannes met through mutual friends 12 years ago, before tying the knot in June 2014 in a low-key ceremony in Bedford, upstate New York.

Discussing the secret to the couple's happy marriage, Olivia previously told Harper's Bazaar Australia: 'We try not to ever be separated more than seven days. It’s just something we have always done.'
